articles.author: Rahul Sadhu
articles.title: Sleeping on streets to being UFC heavyweight champion: The incredible story of Francis Ngannou - The Indian Express
articles.description: Five years after being homeless on the streets of Paris, Francis Ngannou was crowned UFC heavyweight champion.
articles.content:
Francis Ngannous incredible story is not only a rags-to-riches tale but also how he went through hell to reach the brass ring at the top.
